description: Sum of digits of n modulo 10.
formula: a(n) =A010879(A007953(n)) =(n+a(floor[n/10])) mod 10. So can construct sequence by starting with 0 and mapping 0->0123456789, 1->1234567890, 2->2345678901 etc. (e.g. 0, 0123456789, 0123456789123456789023456789013456789012456..., etc.) and looking at n-th digit of a term with sufficient digits.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Mar 28 2000
